## What are our research questions?

::: {.container-col .incremental .center}
::: {.element .fragment}
1\. Are tonal hierarchies part of human psychology?
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
What is the effect of experience on tonal hierarchies?
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
What is the developmental trajectory of tonal hierarchies?
:::

::: {.element .fragment}
2\. How are tonal hierarchies reflected in the world's music?
:::
:::

## How are we answering these questions?

::: {.container-col .incremental .center}
::: {.element .fragment}
1\. Are tonal hierarchies part of human psychology?
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Ideally:** causally intervene on development/experience and measure how this affects tonal profiles intraindividually holding stimuli constant
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Actually:** measure tonal profiles inter-individually in diverse samples and analyse variation at group level holding stimuli constant
:::

:::

## How are we answering these questions?

::: {.container-col .incremental .center}
::: {.element .fragment}
2\. How are tonal hierarchies reflected in the world's music?
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Ideally:** analyse variation in tonal profiles for the world's music holding the perceiver constant
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Actually:** analyse variation in tonal profiles for a diverse sample of music averaging across diverse sample of people
:::

:::

## How are we going to measure this?

::: {.container-col .incremental .center}
::: {.element .fragment}
1\. Web-based citizen science on themusiclab.org
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Study 1**: measuring tonal hierarchies using the tone-probe method in naturalistic stimuli
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Study 2**: measuring tonal hierarchies via their effect on short-term memory in artificial stimuli
:::

:::

## How are we going to measure this?

::: {.container-col .incremental .center}

::: {.element}
2\. Studies in the ELLA/baby lab
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Study 3**: validation study of using pupillometry to implicitly measure tonal hierarchies in adults
:::

::: {.element2 .fragment}
**Study 4**: Using pupillometry to implicitly measure tonal hierarchies in babies (from ~5months - 3 years)
:::

:::
